main.name: brent-hci-proj
main.description: I am a web development engineer and I use reactjs to develop pages. This project is my resume, so feel free to explore
main.bio: My name  is Brent G. Bernasol and I am an amatuer web developer in front-end and back-end projects. Since I was a kid I always love working with computers especially in pc gaming.
main.contactmessage: Dear readers if you are interested to work a project with me, dont hesitate to contact me below. I am currently looking for clients who are looking to have development and maintenance in their websites.
